import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import "./Product.css"; import { CarouselProvider, Slider, Slide, Dot } from "pure-react-carousel"; import "pure-react-carousel/dist/react-carousel.es.css"; import axios from "axios"; import { baseUrl } from "../baseUrl/baseUrl"; import { useParams } from "react-router-dom"; const Product = () => { const [product, setProduct] = useState(null); const params = useParams(); console.log(params); useEffect(() => { axios.get(baseUrl + `/products/${params.id}`).then((res) => { setProduct(res.data); }); }, []); return (
{product && product.title}
